itunes:title: Episode 251 - Kevin Sorbo Goes Off!
title: Episode 251 - Kevin Sorbo Goes Off!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Special guest Kevin Sorbo stops by to discuss his new film "Let There Be Light" that was produced and financed by Sean Hannity, what it's like be a Republican actor in Hollywood, and what he really thinks of liberals in general.
itunes:summary:
Special guest Kevin Sorbo stops by to discuss his new film "Let There Be Light" that was produced and financed by Sean Hannity, what it's like be a Republican actor in Hollywood, and what he really thinks of liberals in general.
